page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: The types of recreation found in the area are as varied as the people who live here. Country sports abound although not necessarily supported by all. The area is{hunted}by the Belvoir Hunt.{Shooting}is available both for organised parties and the individual. There is{ferreting}in local rabbit warrens.{Walking}is restricted as many footpaths have been lost.{Horse related sports are very popular. {Gardening}both flower and vegetable is a very common recreation. The mobile {library}visits fortnightly. There are {squash}courts at Newton (2 miles) and the Leisure Centre and other venues in Grantham (7 miles) offer{swimming, {squash, badminton, bowls and gymnasium activities. Much of people's spare time is spent on maintaining and improving their{homes.
